body: The character looks good but the way they rape her its just to fast why not play it a little by a little. You know, ask her to change her outfit with a sexy mini one(^_^) , bind her eyes just says its part of the production and then play with her a little with her smooth hand, lips, any,etc. There is one author that really impress me with his/her imagination and that is OYSTER. Yeah its you OYSTER. The more story , more deep, good character arts not like others. Especially with a big boobs(SUPER BIG) not really love that.What was that for?. Its just unnatural, lose my appetite. But , still some of them i like it its just the way they make its just to exaggerate.
